page.title: 01An Introduction To Our Area.
page.content:
{An account written by Kathryn Phelps.
Our valley is situated on the north-western part of Gwent.It is on the edge of a large coalfield.This coalfield is called The South Wales Coalfield.Most people in this area work in a factory, the steel industry, or in the mines. Our valley is shaped like a letter "U".It has two branches. The River Ebbw is the main river running through the area.The Ebbw Fach which means "little Ebbw" runs north west of Abertillery,which is our main town.The Ebbw Fach joins the Ebbw Fawr five and a half miles away at Aberbeeg.
